actions.name: Power Construct

cost.trigger: The user crosses the [Desperation 1/2] threshold, and is not in their Complete Forme.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user crosses the [Desperation 1/2] threshold, and is not in their Complete Forme.

Effect: The user transforms into their Complete Forme for the the rest of the Combat, gaining @Affliction[braced] 3 and recovering 8 Ticks of HP.

actions.name: Core Enforcer
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets gain @Affliction[nullified] 7. On resultion, the user gains a Tick of HP.

system.description:
Trigger: The user crosses the [Desperation 1/2] threshold, and is not in their Complete Forme.

Effect: Connection - Core Enforcer. The user transforms into their Complete Forme for the the rest of the Combat, gaining @Affliction[braced] 3 and recovering 8 Ticks of HP.
